BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Governmental Operations, State & Federal Legislation

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Governmental Operations, State & Federal Legislation
Oversight - State of the City Workforce.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - State of the City Workforce.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of citywide administrative services to maintain an interactive webpage providing information on the city government workforce and to publish semiannual reports aggregating and summarizing such information
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of citywide administrative services to maintain an interactive webpage providing information on the city government workforce and to publish semiannual reports aggregating and summarizing such information.
